org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel

Interface FontFormatting

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HSSFFontFormatting, XSSFFontFormatting 

    public interface FontFormatting
    High level representation for Font Formatting component of Conditional Formatting settings(条件字形设置的字形组件的高级表示)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      short getEscapementType()
      get the type of super or subscript for the font(获取字体的超级或下标类型)
      Color getFontColor() 
      short getFontColorIndex() 
      int getFontHeight()
      gets the height of the font in 1/20th point units(获取字体高度，单位为1/20分)
      short getUnderlineType()
      get the type of underlining for the font(获取字体的眼线类型)
      boolean isBold()
      get whether the font weight is set to bold or not(获取字体权重是否设置为粗体)
      boolean isItalic() 
      boolean isStruckout() 
      void resetFontStyle()
      set font style options to default values (non-italic, non-bold)(设置字体样式选项为默认值（非斜体，非粗体）)
      void setEscapementType(short escapementType)
      set the escapement type for the font(设置字体的擒纵机构类型)
      void setFontColor(Color color)
      Sets the colour to use(设置要使用的颜色)
      void setFontColorIndex(short color)
      Sets the indexed colour to use(设置要使用的索引颜色)
      void setFontHeight(int height)
      Sets the height of the font in 1/20th point units(以1/20分单位设置字体高度)
      void setFontStyle(boolean italic, boolean bold)
      set font style options.(设置字体样式选项。)
      void setUnderlineType(short underlineType)
      set the type of underlining type for the font(设置字体的加线类型)

    • Method Detail

      • getEscapementType

        short getEscapementType()
        get the type of super or subscript for the font(获取字体的超级或下标类型)
        Returns:
        super or subscript option(超级或订阅选项)
        See Also:
        Font.SS_NONE, Font.SS_SUPER, Font.SS_SUB

      • setEscapementType

        void setEscapementType(short escapementType)
        set the escapement type for the font(设置字体的擒纵机构类型)
        Parameters:
        escapementType - super or subscript option(escapementType - super或subtitle选项)
        See Also:
        Font.SS_NONE, Font.SS_SUPER, Font.SS_SUB

      • getFontColorIndex

        short getFontColorIndex()
        Returns:
        font colour index, or 0 if not indexed (XSSF only)(字体颜色索引，如果未索引，则为0（仅限XSSF）)

      • setFontColorIndex

        void setFontColorIndex(short color)
        Sets the indexed colour to use(设置要使用的索引颜色)
        Parameters:
        color - font colour index(颜色-字体颜色指数)

      • getFontColor

        Color getFontColor()
        Returns:
        The colour of the font, or null if no colour applied(字体的颜色，如果未应用颜色，则为空)

      • setFontColor

        void setFontColor(Color color)
        Sets the colour to use(设置要使用的颜色)
        Parameters:
        color - font colour to use(颜色-要使用的字体颜色)

      • getFontHeight

        int getFontHeight()
        gets the height of the font in 1/20th point units(获取字体高度，单位为1/20分)
        Returns:
        fontheight (in points/20); or -1 if not modified(fontheight（单位：分/20）;或-1，如果未修改)

      • setFontHeight

        void setFontHeight(int height)
        Sets the height of the font in 1/20th point units(以1/20分单位设置字体高度)
        Parameters:
        height - the height in twips (in points/20)(height -高度，单位为两英寸（分/20）)

      • getUnderlineType

        short getUnderlineType()
        get the type of underlining for the font(获取字体的眼线类型)
        Returns:
        font underlining type(字体下划线类型)
        See Also:
        Font.U_NONE, Font.U_SINGLE, Font.U_DOUBLE, Font.U_SINGLE_ACCOUNTING, Font.U_DOUBLE_ACCOUNTING

      • setUnderlineType

        void setUnderlineType(short underlineType)
        set the type of underlining type for the font(设置字体的加线类型)
        Parameters:
        underlineType - super or subscript option(underlineType -超级或下标选项)
        See Also:
        Font.U_NONE, Font.U_SINGLE, Font.U_DOUBLE, Font.U_SINGLE_ACCOUNTING, Font.U_DOUBLE_ACCOUNTING

      • isBold

        boolean isBold()
        get whether the font weight is set to bold or not(获取字体权重是否设置为粗体)
        Returns:
        bold - whether the font is bold or not(粗体-字体是否为粗体)

      • isItalic

        boolean isItalic()
        Returns:
        true if font style was set to italic(如果字体样式设置为粗体，则为真)

      • isStruckout

        boolean isStruckout()
        Returns:
        true if font strikeout is on(如果字体删除线已打开，则为真)

      • setFontStyle

        void setFontStyle(boolean italic,
                  boolean bold)
        set font style options.(设置字体样式选项。)
        Parameters:
        italic - - if true, set posture style to italic, otherwise to normal(Italic - -如果为真，请将姿势风格设置为Italic，否则设置为正常)
        bold - if true, set font weight to bold, otherwise to normal(粗体-如果为真，则将字体权重设置为粗体，否则设置为正常)

      • resetFontStyle

        void resetFontStyle()
        set font style options to default values (non-italic, non-bold)(设置字体样式选项为默认值（非斜体，非粗体）)
